actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress concerning the arrest of Ms. Lee Ya-p'ing by the authorities on Taiwan.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Taiwan authorities should unconditionally release Ms. Lee Ya-p'ing and officially renounce any claim to jurisdiction over lawfully performed acts in the United States, including acts involving speech and the press. Urges the President to use all peaceable means to obtain her release and to secure assurances from the Taiwan authorities that such incidents will not happen again.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress concerning the arrest of Ms. Lee Ya-p'ing by the authorities on Taiwan.
